attributes.action: Put a stop to Muslim extremists
attributes.additional_details:
With Muslims become more and more brainwashed by Islam, we are under increased threat from Muslim extremist groups. After reading in the news that they're planning on capitalising the UK by using 'Sharia Zones' I personally just can NOT sit and accept this.

We need to unite and stand up against this extremist hate preaching group of individuals (who WILL soon take over).

This is NOT a hate breeding group, nor a racist attack, this is a simple stand up against a violation of equal human rights and opportunity.

If you want your neighbourhood to have split sex zones, no smoking, no alcohol, no pornography and no casual clothing then stay quiet and accept the change.

If you're AGAINST this then please SIGN THE PETITION asap and we may well be able to do something about this!
